articles.description: Microsoft warned today of ongoing human-operated ransomware campaigns targeting healthcare organizations and critical services, and shared tips on how to block new breaches by patching vulnerable internet-facing systems.
articles.content:

articles.title: The Last of Us 2 is back on the PlayStation Store after a brief absence - GamesRadar
articles.description: You'll need to pre-order again if yours was refunded
articles.content:
The Last of Us 2
 is back on the PlayStation Store
 after an indefinite delay led Sony to disable its listing.

articles.title: Google's AI Health Screening Tool Claimed 90 Percent Accuracy, but Failed to Deliver in Real World Tests - Newsweek
articles.description: Google said its AI showed a "specialist-level accuracy" of more than 90 percent for the detection of referable cases of diabetic retinopathy (DR). In reality, it quickly faced unforeseen challenges.
articles.content:
A team of Google researchers is going back to the drawing board after an artificial intelligence-based health care project fell short of expectations.
